summary:
I have been an active member of several organizations, including the Youth Parliament of Aruba, the International Order of DeMolay of Aruba, and Scouting Aruba. Through my involvement in these organizations, I have gained invaluable experience in leadership, problem-solving, and quick decision-making. I am also someone who enjoys expressing my opinions, and I am skilled at doing so in a professional and constructive manner.

In addition to my leadership skills, I have received numerous awards and completed various courses in different areas. For instance, I hold a first aid and AED certificate, which allows me to help those in need. I am adept at managing tasks and leading projects and group assignments. I take the initiative to find tasks to do rather than waiting to be assigned them.

awards.title: critical thinker
awards.description: In 2021, I was recognized as a Critical Thinker for my active participation and contribution of ideas and opinions in the Youth Parliament of Aruba. Through my engagement, I demonstrated my ability to analyze information critically, evaluate different perspectives, and provide constructive feedback. This award recognizes my dedication to the organization and my commitment to promoting meaningful change within the community.

awards.title: Winner of Poder di Hubentud
awards.description: I participated in the Poder di Hubentud (Power of Youth) project, where I was selected by a recognized organization in Aruba to attend meetings and courses designed to enhance my knowledge and skills in project management, logistics, finance, marketing, and creativity. The program culminated in a competition where participants were required to present a project in one of four categories, with judges selecting a winner to receive funding for their proposed project. I chose the health category, and developed a project that focused on promoting the mental and physical health of underprivileged youth. Ultimately, I was recognized as the winner of the competition in the 15-17 year old category, which highlights my ability to think creatively, execute ideas effectively, and make a positive impact on my community.
awards.issuer: Asociacion Trabao di Hubentud na Aruba (ATHA)

projects.title: Let the games begin
projects.description: I have organized multiple successful gaming events where I was responsible for planning and executing the event, as well as marketing it to a targeted audience. To ensure a high-quality experience, I coordinated the necessary equipment and resources, including TVs, gaming consoles, and prizes. Furthermore, I fostered a positive and respectful environment, encouraging healthy competition among attendees while maintaining a safe and inclusive atmosphere. Through my event organization experience, I have honed my project management, communication, and leadership skills, while also gaining valuable experience in event planning and execution.

projects.title: Beach cleanup
projects.description: At the YMCA together with their youth club i helped organize 3 beach cleanups around the island.

profile_positions.description:
I was offered a position at YMCA Aruba after volunteering for some time, as they recognized my dedication and believed I would make a valuable employee. From September 2021 until July 2022, when I had to leave for my studies abroad, I worked as a youth worker. My responsibilities included caring for the children, organizing activities, preparing food, and teaching them basic cooking and baking skills. I also mediated conflicts between children and informed parents when necessary, as well as answered any general questions they had.

In my last month, I had the honor of being the camp coordinator for the Oranjestad location. As the camp coordinator, I helped plan the camp, ensured that all youth workers had the necessary equipment, and resolved any logistical issues that arose. Additionally, I contacted other organizations to give presentations or provide assistance with equipment, such as coordinating with the fire department to have firefighters spray water on the children during water day. When the two locations were combined for events such as beach or sports days, I worked with the coordinator for the San Nicolas location to ensure a smooth operation and come up with on the spot ideas when time needed to be filled
profile_positions.title: Youth Worker

volunteer_experiences.description: I volunteered at a local food bank where I assisted with various tasks, including creating food packages, distributing them, and engaging with individuals in need. My responsibilities required me to work effectively in a team environment, while also communicating compassionately and empathetically with people. Through my time at the food bank, I developed a strong understanding of the importance of community support and the value of giving back.

volunteer_experiences.role: Y's daycare volunteer and camp volunteer
volunteer_experiences.description: As a co-youth leader at the YMCA, I played a vital role in supporting children with their homework, , providing assistance when needed, and fostering a positive learning environment. Additionally, I prepared various types of snacks, organized and facilitated engaging and creative activities, and assisted with other general tasks as needed. Through my work, I developed strong teamwork, communication skills, and patience, while also gaining a deeper appreciation for the importance of empowering youth."
